block.p: Vanessa Mara Kroll, a daughter of Lynn Korda Kroll and Jules B. Kroll of Rye, N.Y., was married yesterday evening at her parents' house to Roger James Bennett, a son of Valerie Bennett and Judge Ivor Bennett of Liverpool, England. Rabbi Alfredo Borodowski officiated.

Mrs. Bennett, 24, graduated magna cum laude from Wellesley College. She is a research associate at Kroll Associates in New York, the security and investigations company of which her father is the founder and chairman. Her mother is the president of the National Foundation for Jewish Culture in New York and a regent of Georgetown University.

Vanessa Mara Kroll, a daughter of Lynn Korda Kroll and Jules B. Kroll of Rye, N.Y., was married yesterday evening at her parents' house to Roger James Bennett, a son of Valerie Bennett and Judge Ivor Bennett of Liverpool, England. Rabbi Alfredo Borodowski officiated.

Mrs. Bennett, 24, graduated magna cum laude from Wellesley College. She is a research associate at Kroll Associates in New York, the security and investigations company of which her father is the founder and chairman. Her mother is the president of the National Foundation for Jewish Culture in New York and a regent of Georgetown University.

Mr. Bennett, 30, is the director of special projects at the Andrea and Charles Bronfman Philanthropies in New York. He graduated from Leeds University in England. His father is a district court judge in Liverpool and St. Helen's, England.
